clientsort.name: ClientSort
message.clientsort.installCloth: Install Cloth Config API to access mod options.
option.clientsort.interactionRate.toolti: Reduce to sort faster, increase if you are experiencing packet rate issues
option.clientsort.serverAcceleratedSorti: Whether to sort instantly in singleplayer and when the mod is installed on the server
option.clientsort.optimizedCreativeSorti: Whether to improve performance of creative-order sorting by storing the order in memory
option.clientsort.lmbBundle.tooltip: In 1.21.2+, bundles use left-click to load, which breaks sorting. If playing on a 1.21.2+ server, enable this option.
option.clientsort.soundMinPitch.tooltip: Initial pitch of the sorting sound
option.clientsort.soundMaxPitch.tooltip: Final pitch of the sorting sound
option.clientsort.soundAllowOverlap.tool: Whether to allow the previous sound to continue when starting a new sound
hotbarScope.clientsort.HOTBAR.tooltip: Hotbar will be sorted as a separate inventory
hotbarScope.clientsort.INVENTORY.tooltip: Hotbar will be sorted as part of the main inventory
extraSlotScope.clientsort.EXTRA.tooltip: Extra slots will be sorted as a separate inventory
extraSlotScope.clientsort.HOTBAR.tooltip: Extra slots will be sorted as part of the hotbar
extraSlotScope.clientsort.INVENTORY.tool: Extra slots will be sorted as part of the main inventory
extraSlotScope.clientsort.NONE.tooltip: Extra slots will not be sortable
